sentence: But the bill has also attracted major GOP critics such as Florida Sen. Marco Rubio, Tennessee Sen. Marsha Blackburn, House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy and House Judiciary ranking member Jim Jordan of Ohio, all of whom have done interviews with Breitbart opposing the legislation.
title: Split on the right: Breitbart joins Facebook and Google in opposing news media bill

sentence: Make America Great Again!” When Pelosi launched her January 6 committee, McCarthy recommended that Rep. Jim Banks (R-IN) and Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) serve as Republican members.
author: Ben Zeisloft
title: McCarthy Endorses Cheney’s Republican Challenger
